description: the regional blocks for each countries under SDG categories
The total number of school age children(also refered as National population)
The percentage of the population with access to the various services
The type of residence where the schools are located and the school levels
The level of wash services available to the schools based on theJMP wash ladder
The wash services available in the schools
The categories under which the children are grouped
The proportion of students in either the residence type or the school level (sum of residence type share or school level proportions equals the total population or national population)
